content: The person writing this should have done more research. First, Trump isn’t running or profiting his hotels directly, and there’s no evidence that he’s receiving any income from it. Plus, we have no indication that he’s gaining anything financially from being president. In reality, he’s probably making considerably less money and we know he even donated his salary to the National Park Service. If anything, they should be more concerned about how this affected Obama. He was receiving gifts from Middle Eastern governments. For example, King Abdullah from Saudi Arabia was giving him (and Hillary Clinton) lavish gifts, which would directly violate the emolument clause.
